simacogo

Class PrintGame

  • java.lang.Object
    • simacogo.Game
      • simacogo.PrintGame

  • public class PrintGame
extends Game
    An extension of the Game class that has methods to get user input and print out the Game board, scores, and game winner.
    Author:
    Patrick Drucker

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      PrintGame()
      Constructor for PrintGame.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void printWinner()
      Prints out the final score of the game and the winner of the game (or a draw).
      boolean takeTurn()
      Performs both the Human and Computer turns.

    • Constructor Detail

      • PrintGame

        public PrintGame()
          throws java.io.IOException
        Constructor for PrintGame. Uses Game's default constructor and initializes the numPlies by retrieving user input. Also prints the empty board state.
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException

    • Method Detail

      • takeTurn

        public boolean takeTurn()
                 throws java.io.IOException
        Performs both the Human and Computer turns. Returns whether the game has finished or not.
        Returns:
        finished true if game has ended or quit, false otherwise
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException

      • printWinner

        public void printWinner()
                 throws java.io.IOException
        Prints out the final score of the game and the winner of the game (or a draw).
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException
